Allows: Provided along withRobot Ops Control Center:
infobox_data.Ability: Can be toggled as the primary vehicle production structure (if the player have multiplewar factoriesat the same time)
Notes: The more war factories the player have, the faster vehicles are produced
Can be infiltrated for veteran vehicle production

article_tables.title: Standard vehicles
rows:
Resource Vehicle. Unarmed.
Requires Allied Ore Refinery
Abilities:
Harvests ore with a capacity of 500 ores/750 gems
Teleports into Ore Refineries when ordered or fully loaded

Unmanned Light Vehicle. Strong vs. Infantry.
Abilities:
Detects cloaked and disguised units
Amphibious

Light Vehicle. Strong vs. Infantry.
Abilities:
Transports infantry with 2 passenger slots
Replaces Robot Tank in Act One Allied campaign.

Multirole Light Vehicle. Strong vs. Aircraft.
Abilities:
Transports infantry with 1 passenger slot
Weapon changes depending on the transported infantry
Repairs vehicles when an Engineer is onboard
Bulldog Light Tank

Main Battle Tank. Strong vs. Armor.
Abilities:
Deploy to switch between cannon and target painter modes
Target painter weakens the armor of enemy targets by 15%, but cannot directly harm them

Multirole Medium Vehicle. Strong vs. Aircraft.
Abilities:
Transports infantry with 1 passenger slot
Weapon changes depending on the transported infantry
Repairs vehicles when an Engineer is onboard
Cavalier Medium Battle Tank

Main Battle Tank. Strong vs. Armor.
Abilities:
Fires faster the longer it attacks a target
Tsurugi Powersuit

Multirole Light Walker. Strong vs. Aircraft.
Abilities:
Transports infantry with 1 passenger slot
Weapon changes depending on the transported infantry
Repairs vehicles when an Engineer is onboard
Immune to poison and radiation
Kappa Hover Tank

Main Battle Tank. Strong vs. Armor.
Abilities:
Amphibious
Allied Mobile Construction Vehicle

Construction Vehicle. Unarmed.
Requires Air Force Command Headquarters
Abilities:
Deploy into an Allied Construction Yard

Advanced Tank. Strong vs. Armor.
Requires  Shield Command
Abilities:
Disguised as a tree when stationary

Artillery. Strong vs. Armor.
Requires  Robot Ops Control Center
Abilities:
Performs a long-range attack with Zephyrobot

Advanced Artillery. Strong vs. Structures.
Requires Tech Center and  Mercury Network Uplink
Abilities:
Using a Mercury Strike near it boosts its firepower by 25%
Deploy to switch between auto attack or hold fire modes

Monster Tank. Strong vs. Ground Targets.
Requires Tech Center and  Mercury Network Uplink

Medium Vehicle. Strong vs. Aircraft (no ground attack).
Requires Tech Center and  Mercury Network Uplink
Deploy to switch between regular and sniper modes

Advanced Artillery. Strong vs. Infantry, Structures.
Requires Tech Center and  Shield Command

Monster Tank. Strong vs. Infantry, Armor.
Requires Tech Center and  Shield Command
Abilities:
Instantly erases most ground units
Deploy to switch between auto attack or hold fire modes

Advanced Artillery. Strong vs. Structures.
Requires Tech Center and  Robot Ops Control Center
Carries a Hailjet to attack

Medium Vehicle. Strong vs. Infantry, Aircraft.
Requires Tech Center and  Robot Ops Control Center
Abilities:
Reduces the speed of enemy infantry and Soviet drones by 50%

Monster Tank. Strong vs. Everything.
Requires Tech Center and  Robot Ops Control Center
Abilities:
Transports infantry with 4 passenger slots
Infantry can fire out of the Battle Tortoise
Crushes all infantry and most vehicles

article_tables.title: Standard aircraft
rows:
Transport Aircraft. Unarmed.
Requires Air Force Command Headquarters
Abilities:
Transports infantry with 6 passenger slots
Invisible on radar

Medium Aircraft. Strong vs. Infantry, Armor.
Requires  Mercury Network Uplink
Abilities:
Heals nearby friendly airborne infantry

Heavy Aircraft. Strong vs. Infantry, Aircraft.
Requires Tech Center and  Shield Command
Abilities:
Deploy to boost the armor of nearby friendly units by 50%, but reduces their speed by 50% and stops the Thor from firing
Receives a 25% firepower boost when near a Lightning Rod

Advanced Support Aircraft.
Requires Tech Center
Abilities:
Slowly freezes ground targets, reducing their speed up to 100% and armor up to 95%
Target is disabled when completely frozen

article_tables.title: Stolen Tech
rows:
Stolen Tech Vehicle. Strong vs. Infantry, Armor, Aircraft.
Requires infiltration of Tech Center and Allied Construction Yard
Requires Mercury Network Uplink/Shield Command/Robot Ops Control Center and Tech Center
Abilities:
Teleport
Transports 1 infantry who cannot exit until it is fully teleported

Stolen Tech Vehicle.
Requires infiltration of Pandora Hub and Epsilon Construction Yard
Requires Mercury Network Uplink/Shield Command/Robot Ops Control Center and Tech Center
Abilities:
Abducts enemy vehicles
Abducted enemy vehicles will fight for the Chrono Prison's owner.

Unmanned Stolen Tech Vehicle. Strong vs. Ground Targets.
Requires infiltration of Cloud Piercer and Foehn Construction Yard
Requires Mercury Network Uplink/Shield Command/Robot Ops Control Center and Tech Center
Abilities:
Detects cloaked units
Invisible on radar
Deploy to switch between lasers/grenade launchers and particle collider modes
